site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area,North West London
description: Submission of details pursuant to Condition 14 (Surface Water Infrastructure) and Condition 15 (Foul Water Infrastructure)  in relation to the construction site comprising the northern blocks (Blocks A, B, C and D only) of Plot 13 of Reserved Matters Approval reference 18/6337/RMA dated 18/03/2019 (as amended by 20/1209/NMA, 20/5693/NMA, 21/5982/NMA, 23/0621/NMA and 23/5027/NMA) within the Phase 1C sub-phase of planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/2014 for the comprehensive redevelopment of the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
